title: Do all Spaniards and Portuguese have ancestors who were Muslim once? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. The north remained Christian, and it repopulated the peninsula as they advanced south. So, some people do, and some people don't. However, they may have Muslim ancestors, but mainly Spaniards, not north African. There were very few people actually moving from North Africa to Spain. In terms of population, it is a tiny fraction.
